conventions.style: Formatted as '<A_count>v<B_count>' where A is the first side and B is the second side.

placeholders.FalseAttackA: Non-lethal action descriptor for side A alt-mode
placeholders.FalseAttackB: Non-lethal action descriptor for side B alt-mode

rules: Actions involve both sides explicitly (A1..Ak and B1..Bm named).
No eliminations or removals—pure interaction and narration.
25% of each style include vehicle or combiner placeholders (1/2/3 v ANY use vehicles; 4/5 v ANY mix vehicles/combiners).
About half of alt-mode templates include both sides in alt-mode; the rest are A-side only.
When alt-modes are used, actions include {FalseAttackA} and optionally {FalseAttackB} to describe non-lethal maneuvers.
Templates remain reusable and thematic for Cybertron Games.
